OCC: I don't know how I have the idea tho make a gelstat so 
strange... but I liked to do something diferent.

Hecate::

The femme gelstat was formed and it was very strange, It had a slim, 
dark body. Her Back was covered by asort of shield that was madethe 
bird-prey wings of the femmes. The gelstat had  four arms and her 
hands ended in sharped craws... Hecate had a helmet that make her 
seem that she had three faces the tru was in front of, and other was 
in each side of her tru face.

As soon as Hecate was formed, she started to help the new Predacons, 
watting to Sharpcraws and the others arrive.
